numericalExperiment.rationale: To explore the degree to which future climate states depend on the initial climate state (from 'A Summary of the CMIP5 Experiment Design' by Karl Taylor et al. 2008)
numericalExperiment.why: Provide estimate of future antrhopogenic climate change

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.ic
numericalRequirement.description: Initial conditions are from the end of experiment 3.2_historical

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.wmg.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP6 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.sls.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP6 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.aer.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP6 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.aer_pre.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP6 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.wmg.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP6 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.sls.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP6 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.aer.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP6 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.aer_pre.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP6 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 4.4.bc.aer_volc.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed constant background volcanic aerosol may (or may not) be specified
